verses.verse: Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
"On the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> of the first <WH259> month <WH2320> you shall raise up <WH6965> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting. <WH4150>
You shall put <WH7760> the ark <WH727> of the testimony <WH5715> in it, <WH8033> and you shall screen <WH5526> the ark <WH727> with the veil. <WH6532>
You shall bring <WH935> in the table, <WH7979> and set in order <WH6186> the things that are on it. <WH6187> You shall bring <WH935> in the lampstand, <WH4501> and light <WH5927> its lamps. <WH5216>

You shall set <WH5414> the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196> for incense <WH7004> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> and put <WH7760> the screen <WH4539> of the door <WH6607> to the tabernacle. <WH4908>
"You shall set <WH5414> the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> before <WH6440> the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the Tent <WH4908> of Meeting. <WH4150>
You shall set <WH5414> the basin <WH3595> between the Tent <WH168> of Meeting <WH4150> and the altar, <WH4196> and shall put <WH5414> water therein. <WH4325>
You shall set up <WH7760> the court <WH2691> around <WH5439> it, <WH7760> and hang up the screen <WH4539> of the gate <WH8179> of the court. <WH2691>

"You shall take <WH3947> the anointing <WH4888> oil, <WH8081> and anoint <WH4886> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and all that is in it, <WH6942> and shall make it holy, and all its furniture: <WH3627> and it will be holy. <WH6944>

You shall anoint <WH4886> the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering, <WH5930> with all its vessels, <WH3627> and sanctify <WH6942> the altar: <WH4196> and the altar <WH4196> will be most <WH6944> holy. <WH6944>
You shall anoint <WH4886> the basin <WH3595> and its base, <WH3653> and sanctify it. <WH6942>
"You shall bring <WH7126> Aaron <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> to the door <WH6607> of the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> and shall wash <WH7364> them with water. <WH4325>
You shall put <WH3847> on Aaron <WH175> the holy <WH6944> garments; <WH899> and you shall anoint <WH4886> him, <WH6942> and sanctify him, <WH3547> that he may minister to me in the priest's office.
You shall bring <WH7126> his sons, <WH1121> and put <WH3847> coats on them. <WH3801>

You shall anoint <WH4886> them, <WH4886> as you anointed their father, <WH1> that they may minister to me in the priest <WH3547>'s office. Their anointing <WH4888> shall be to them for an everlasting <WH5769> priesthood <WH3550> throughout their generations. <WH1755>"
Moses <WH4872> did <WH6213> so. <WH3068> According to all that Yahweh commanded <WH6680> him, <WH6213> so he did.
It happened in the first <WH7223> month <WH2320> in the second <WH8145> year, <WH8141> on the first <WH7223> day of the month, <WH2320> that the tabernacle <WH4908> was raised up. <WH6965>

Moses <WH4872> raised up <WH6965> the tabernacle, <WH4908> and laid <WH5414> its sockets, <WH134> and set up <WH7760> its boards, <WH7175> and put <WH5414> in its bars, <WH1280> and raised up <WH6965> its pillars. <WH5982>

He spread the covering <WH168> over <WH6566> the tent, <WH168> and put <WH7760> the roof <WH4372> of the tabernacle <WH4908> above <WH4605> on it, <WH3068> as Yahweh commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

He took <WH3947> and put <WH5414> the testimony <WH5715> into the ark, <WH727> and set <WH7760> the poles <WH905> on the ark, <WH727> and put <WH5414> the mercy seat <WH3727> above <WH4605> on the ark. <WH727>

He brought <WH935> the ark <WH727> into the tabernacle, <WH4908> and set up <WH7760> the veil <WH6532> of the screen, <WH4539> and screened <WH5526> the ark <WH727> of the testimony, <WH5715> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
He put <WH5414> the table <WH7979> in the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> northward, <WH6828> outside <WH2351> of the veil. <WH6532>
He set <WH6187> the bread <WH3899> in order <WH6186> on it before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
He put <WH7760> the lampstand <WH4501> in the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> opposite <WH5227> the table, <WH7979> on the side <WH3409> of the tabernacle <WH4908> southward. <WH5045>
He lit <WH5927> the lamps <WH5216> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
He put <WH7760> the golden <WH2091> altar <WH4196> in the Tent <WH168> of Meeting <WH4150> before <WH6440> the veil; <WH6532>
and he burnt <WH6999> incense <WH7004> of sweet <WH5561> spices on it, <WH3068> as Yahweh commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
He put up <WH7760> the screen <WH4539> of the door <WH6607> to the tabernacle. <WH4908>

He set <WH7760> the altar <WH4196> of burnt offering <WH5930> at the door <WH6607> of the tabernacle <WH4908> of the Tent <WH4908> of Meeting, <WH4150> and offered <WH5927> on it the burnt offering <WH5930> and the meal offering, <WH4503> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>
He set <WH7760> the basin <WH3595> between the Tent <WH168> of Meeting <WH4150> and the altar, <WH4196> and put <WH5414> water <WH4325> therein, <WH7364> with which to wash.
Moses, <WH4872> Aaron, <WH175> and his sons <WH1121> washed <WH7364> their hands <WH3027> and their feet there. <WH7272>
When they went <WH935> into the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> and when they came near <WH7126> to the altar, <WH4196> they washed, <WH7364> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>

He raised up <WH6965> the court <WH2691> around <WH5439> the tabernacle <WH4908> and the altar, <WH4196> and set up <WH5414> the screen <WH4539> of the gate <WH8179> of the court. <WH2691> So Moses <WH4872> finished <WH3615> the work. <WH4399>
Then the cloud <WH6051> covered <WH3680> the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> and the glory <WH3519> of Yahweh <WH3068> filled <WH4390> the tabernacle. <WH4908>

Moses <WH4872> wasn't <WH3201> able to enter <WH935> into the Tent <WH168> of Meeting, <WH4150> because the cloud <WH6051> stayed <WH7931> on it, <WH3068> and Yahweh's glory <WH3519> filled <WH4390> the tabernacle. <WH4908>
When the cloud <WH6051> was taken up <WH5927> from <WH5921> over the tabernacle, <WH4908> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went onward, <WH5265> throughout all their journeys; <WH4550>
but if the cloud <WH6051> wasn't <WH5927> taken up, then they didn't <WH5265> travel until the day <WH3117> that it was taken up. <WH5927>

For the cloud <WH6051> of Yahweh <WH3068> was on the tabernacle <WH4908> by day, <WH3119> and there was fire <WH784> in the cloud by night, <WH3915> in the sight <WH5869> of all the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> throughout all their journeys. <WH4550>
